attributes.description: Philadelphia Lawyers for Social Equity (PLSE) is a non-profit legal aid organization that focuses on helping people overcome the barriers they face as a result of criminal records.
attributes.name: Philadelphia Lawyers for Social Equity - Criminal Record Expungement & Pardons
